query: We're a group of four looking to arrange a 7-day trip from Providence to explore 3 cities in Florida from March 1st to March 7th, 2022. Our total budget is $20,300. We'll be bringing our pets along, so places with pet-friendly rules are a must. We have a diverse palate and are interested in trying Indian, Italian, Mediterranean, and French cuisines. As for our stay, we require accommodations that are pet-friendly. Please note, we won't be self-driving and would prefer other modes of transportation.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Punta Gorda,Daytona Beach,Tampa]
